event.title: F# OSS Hack Day and Game Jam (Cambridge)
event.description:
To take part, all you need is entrance fee (Â£8) to the museum (it is a charity), enthusiasm, a laptop and the desire to have a lot of fun.

Hope to see you there :)

If you are interested in making games specially in F# or Elm, we'll be able to help. Make sure you come up with a laptop with the language installed.
